title: How many documented deaths are there in the Old and New Testament? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thats like the question: How many deaths are in Saving Private Ryan?How many deaths are in the movie Pearl Harbor?Or how many deaths are in the D-Day documentary?I’m sure well over a million. Perhaps 5 ot 10 million. But it doesn’t understand itself as a question. These questions help focus on the question a little more directly: Why did those deaths occur?What is God’s role in the world?Is all violence bad? Is there such a thing as Righteous violence for the justice or good of humility?
Well, there’s everyone on earth, except for eight people, in the Flood. That must be quite a body count.
